html:
10.18.18  2:52 pm   why do you like umbrellas

     are you sure i do

10.18.18  2:40 pm   why is When I Get Older restricted on youtube   

     what does that mean

10.18.18  2:35 pm   10.16.18  9:08 pm how many of your new releases have been this way-- taking an idea and fully producing it in a couple week's time.

     all of them

      how unprecedented is this work flow?

     not very

     are you worried that you will lose this level of production speed?

     i could worry if i wanted to. the option of worrying is on the table

      i love your content, bill. thanks for doing what you do and never stop!

     oh you are very kind

10.18.18  2:14 pm   What actually is the e-tronic earth lifter?

     probably a voice recorder

10.18.18  2:06 pm   how did you get your unique visual style?

     trying to make videos

      how long did it take to get it down and make it look right?

     it has always looked some what right and some what not right

      where do you see it going from here?

     getting better and worse at the same time, as usual

10.18.18  1:19 pm   what is your favorite superpower? 

     being normal

10.18.18  12:57 pm   i have questions about life in general and was told to come here help 

     it looks like you have done that. the next step i would look into is asking the questions

10.18.18  12:31 pm   What is one tastey food that is also healthy.

     water

10.18.18  12:31 pm   do you worry about your fans having an idealized vision of you that actually isn't true

     i could worry about that if i wanted to

10.18.18  12:20 pm   what is negative harmony?

     probably none of my business

10.18.18  12:10 pm   hey bill, what's the weather like today?

     it's ok

10.18.18  11:46 am   symmetry or asymmetry? 

     i wonder if you could combine the 2 some how

10.18.18  11:29 am   is there going to be a new song in two weeks or are you going back to the more sporadic schedule after "when i get older"?

     oh we in it

10.18.18  11:27 am   What is more important? Planning or doing?

     i wonder if you could combine the 2 some how

10.18.18  11:02 am   your basslines are so good, how do you go about making them? do they just pop up in your mind?

     it's kind of like a surfboard. you need to know where the person is (that's the song), and that's where the board should be. yes you can do flips sometimes but you gotta hit the water and stay under the person most of the time, and hug the turns succinctly

10.18.18  10:13 am   Are you real or just a figment of my subconscious? 

     hopefully both

10.18.18  9:31 am   Do you think at some point in the future we'll hear your songs in supermarkets?

     that would be convenient for me

10.18.18  8:37 am   Define "talent".

     it's more fun to play cat and mouse

10.18.18  7:48 am   Music you make good, you like make good music?

     want better

10.18.18  7:19 am   What would you do if you had to have a "traditional" job?

     do it

10.18.18  6:28 am   who needs a schedule when you can just do stuff when you want to

      you could be doing stuff all the time and still not be doing it as fast as you could

10.18.18  5:13 am   you are a heckin cool guy who needs a tour, whens the world tour

     start with city tour

10.18.18  4:08 am   have you considered making a vlog to show folks you're not a vocaloid but actually a real life human person

     i have done a lot of that

10.18.18  2:46 am   when you're working and you think of a really interesting distraction, how do you stop it from completely killing your motivation?

     anything interesting usually adds and creates new motivations

10.18.18  2:41 am   why dont my parents love me

     maybe their parents didn't love them

10.18.18  2:08 am   why do you need to buy your water?

     because clean water is in relatively high demand / low supply

10.18.18  2:01 am   Big fan of the triangle score in when I get older. Do you think triangle is more difficult than people make it out to be?

     the biggest challenge is to make sure it doesn't spin all over the place. because you probably want to use a thin wire if you want it to ring properly

10.18.18  1:25 am   will you ever continue the "reality" videos on your website 

     yes

10.18.18  1:03 am   why do i procrastinate on my homework

     because it sucks?

10.18.18  12:51 am   Would you ever go on h3 podcast?

     sure

10.18.18  12:46 am   This has been bothering me for so long but I need to know. What animal makes the sound "Yooweeyoowow" ? I have no clue and it's bothering me help .

     you

10.18.18  12:17 am   I feel like I will never escape the influence of the artists I've listened to when I'm making my own music. How do I make something that feels original to me?

     try making something besides 'music'

10.18.18  12:11 am   when concert?

     asap

10.17.18  11:35 pm   weird thought: would you be able to thrive in a more traditional creative medium, like film or something?

     sure

10.17.18  11:15 pm   Want a session drummer?

     touring drummer

10.17.18  11:00 pm   how do you feel about the part in "you're free to do whatever you want to" where you use the traditionally incorrect form of "too" at 0:21 seconds (in the video)

     mistake lol

10.17.18  10:48 pm   would you ever participate in a podcast? specifically one that the youtube channel h3h3 hosts?

     sure

10.17.18  10:41 pm   i know you are busy making audio / visual content, but what if you took 1 or 2 weeks off to revamp your merch?

     i would be willing to take a few days to cancel the merch

10.17.18  10:33 pm   hola bill, I'm a large fan, was wondering what genre you classify your music

     it's kind of like a who done it

      in and what your favorite song of yours is, thank

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.17.18  10:32 pm   when you write your songs are they like well thought out or are they just sporadic thoughts strewn together on impulse?

     i use both techniques

10.17.18  10:18 pm   Will you accept the invitation to the h3h3 podcast?

     yes if i can find it in my twitter ....

10.17.18  10:10 pm   I feel like people are annoyed by my happiness. How do I stop feeling that way. 

     tell them you are sad

10.17.18  10:01 pm   When does it get interesting. 

     everytime

10.17.18  10:00 pm   How would you describe the music you make?

     press play on it. actually that's not entirely accurate, because i would still be influencing the perception unfairly due to timing and circumstances. the only way to truly describe something is to leave it some place. that will guarantee that anyone who finds it will find it at exactly the right time

10.17.18  9:59 pm   What if you got a cameraman to help you film? You could get more moving, cinematic shots in your video, or you could film outside. 

     i agree. that is one of a long list of updates that i am looking into

10.17.18  9:25 pm   if you had the skills you have now when you were making vines back in the day, how much faster would it be?

     actually the skills i'm using now are harkening back to the skills i developed and used in late 2015. so it is the same. but during late 2017 and early 2018 it was slower for reasons i don't fully understand

10.17.18  9:24 pm   is 'the whole entire world' supposed to be representative of those in your life and your audience?

     yes but more

10.17.18  9:23 pm   Just out of curiosity, how did you come up with the idea that fame = knight's helmet?   

     snap decision

      Not that it doesn't necessarily fit, I'm just trying to come up with what in your thought process connected fame with knight helmet.

     kind of like when doc brown has like 30 seconds before the lightning strikes and he makes like a zipline thing out of the rope and slides down

10.17.18  9:18 pm   My mom says all your music is the same. Tubas?

     i think that's usually code for 'i don't like it'

10.17.18  9:10 pm   i never understand how you make all your content but it's amazing anyway. do you have a background in art?

     everything is art, i suppose
